ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home, reclaim your privacy and join a worldwide community of tinkerers?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Let's get started by creating a user account.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Enw
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Helo {name}, croeso i ioBroker. Sut hoffech enwi eich t≈∑?
We will set up the basics together. You can always change this later in the settings.
Hoffem wybod ble rydych chi'n byw. Bydd y wybodaeth yn helpu i arddangos gwybodaeth a sefydlu awtomeiddiadau haul. Tydi'r data byth yn cael ei rannu thu allan i'ch rhwydwaith.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: Do you want us to detect your location?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Gallwn eich helpu i lenwi'r wybodaeth hon drwy wneud cais un-tro i wasanaeth allanol.
We filled out some details about your location. Please check if they are correct and continue.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Cynrychiolir dyfeisiau a gwasanaethau yn ioBroker fel integreiddiadau. Gallwch eu gosod nawr, neu'n ddiweddarach o'r sgrin ffurfweddu.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: This includes information about your system.
Details of what you use with ioBroker
Counts containing total number of datapoints.
Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make ioBroker better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.descrip: Alternatively you can restore from a previous backup.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.name: Backup name
